title: France panorama. [No. 74/34]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. City planning: Paris - beating the traffic problem. Nice - curbing a torrent. 2. Solar energy - balance sheet on a new energy producing technique. 3. The arts - an artistic couple. 4. Don Juan in Champagne - the Salzburg Opera.
